hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# SAUVEGARDE DE LA BASE DE DONEES AtlanticWakePark (Application) ssh aloa@vps490005.ovh.net 'mysqldump -u root -p"Palmier-10" atlanticwakepark > /var/www/database_saves/ATLANTICWAKEPARK/export_database_$(date +%Y-%m-%d).sql' cd /var/lib/jenkins/HOME/AtlanticWakePark_SaveDB # Récupération de la sauvegarde de la base de données de ATLANTICWAKEPARK scp -r aloa@vps490005.ovh.net:/var/www/database_saves/ATLANTICWAKEPARK/export_database_$(date +%Y-%m-%d).sql /var/lib/jenkins/HOME/AtlanticWakePark_SaveDB # Copie de la sauvegarde de la base de données de ATLANTICWAKEPARK chez o2switch scp -r /var/lib/jenkins/HOME/AtlanticWakePark_SaveDB/export_database_$(date +%Y-%m-%d).sql myno9622@chirashi.o2switch.net:/home/myno9622/awp.api.aloa85.com/DB_Saves/ # IMPORT DE LA BASE DE DONEES AtlanticWakePark ssh myno9622@chirashi.o2switch.net 'mysql -u myno9622 -p"qyBICBnwSu"\!"M" myno9622_awp < /home/myno9622/awp.api.aloa85.com/DB_Saves/export_database_$(date +%Y-%m-%d).sql' # Il faut faire de la place sur le VPS ssh aloa@vps490005.ovh.net 'rm /var/www/database_saves/ATLANTICWAKEPARK/*'
# On conserve que les 15 derniers jours cd /var/lib/jenkins/HOME/AtlanticWakePark_SaveDB find . -ctime +14 -exec rm {} \; #Chez o2switch aussi ssh myno9622@chirashi.o2switch.net 'find /home/myno9622/awp.api.aloa85.com/DB_Saves -ctime +14 -exec rm {} \;'
